abilities.name: Spirit Mark
abilities.details: Kimiko gains increased movement speed while being unseen by the enemies. Each time Kimiko reveals herself, her next basic attack with a short timeframe deals bonus [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) and mark the target.[n]Hitting a marked target with her basic attacks and <span>Bewitching Dance[/] deals additional [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) to the target and grants herself a small burst of [ms]movement speed[/].

abilities.name: Bewitching Dance
abilities.details: Kimiko's next three basic attack will gain [bf]increased attack speed[/], with each basic attack dealing bonus [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) to the target and surrounding enemies, while briefly [db]slowing[/] the target's movement speed.

abilities.name: Illusion Veil
abilities.details: Kimiko becomes [bf]stealthed[/] and leaps to an ally unit. If the target is an ally hero, Kimiko and the ally will become briefly [bf]stealthed[/].[n]Enemies will be able to very briefly see an after-image of Kimiko's dashing animation at the location she leapt from. When the ally enters stealth mode, the same after-image will also apply, very briefly indicating the direction the ally was moving before becoming stealthed.[n]If Kimiko or her ally attacks or uses an ability while stealthed, the stealth effect will be removed.

abilities.name: Fox Fire
abilities.details: Kimiko sends out a <span>Fox Fire[/] that gains vision around it. If the <span>Fox Fire[/] spots an enemy hero, it will run toward it and explode on the first enemy contact, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) to nearby enemies and [db]revealing[/] them for a while.[n]If no enemy hero is spotted, the <span>Fox Fire[/] will stay still upon reaching the end of its target direction and explode after a few seconds, briefly leaving the [bf]vision field[/] there. The explosion deals the same magical damage.

abilities.name: Enthralling Gaze
abilities.details: Kimiko unleashes a wave of irresistible charm, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) and [db]charms[/] all enemies hit.[n]When charmed, enemies will slowly [db]walk towards[/] Kimiko while also take [db]increased damage[/] from Kimiko.
